about_the_game:
Endless Platformer with Side-Scrolling Camera
Guide Freya through the harsh winds and cold terrain of the far north, overcome many obstacles and avoid pesky penguins who are trying to stop her!

Increase Freya's control and movement speed by knocking down penguins and saving reindeer. These also contribute to your total Dreampoints.

Reach new stages by gathering Dreampoints,
BE WARNED!
Higher stages increase the speed of the storm chasing you!
Higher stages also requires more precise movement and planning.

Some of the obstacles you will be facing are:
  • Spikes
  • Poisonous flowers
  • Rotating platforms
  • Vertical/horizontal platforms
  • Falling platforms


  • Crushing pillars
  • Flying penguins


  • Breakable ice


Thanks for reading, Freya out!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Enduring Dreamers™: Freya

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Think, plan, jump, all while a cold harsh storm forces you forward! Gather Dreampoints to reach higher stages, save reindeer to empower Freya's movement and test your platforming skills by surviving longer than any of your friends!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
